column4: hi, i got the upgrade to (ubunstustudio) 9.10 is stuck on "preparing openoffice.org-writer2latex". most likely this is because of this bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/openoffice/+bug/368570. there are instructions there, but i've got no idea what to do since this is an ongoing upgrade
leave i searched for the solution for the SAME prob, but no success
there is something mesesd with oo writer
if in future you succed to solve the prbome then please let me know.

the problem is with a certain rt kernel. if you manage to install a generic kernel and do the maintenance on it (including upgrade), the problem should be gone, especially with the new version of the -rt kernel

but dont you thing its is VERY MUCH EASY to just use ubuntu and install necessary multimedia softwares? Can anyone tell me whats the ACTUAL diffrenc between ubuntu and ubuntustudio? other than it has already installed multimedia softwares??????????

as far as i know, there's none. ubuntustudio is a tailored choice of elements, but you can reach exactly the same config by hand-installing (although it's not only about multimedia packages, also about the kernel and layout)
but what EXACTLY that kernal diffrence is? I can do all the multimedia work here in ubuntu also naa?
still, they messed up with that kernel and there is no patch
afaik rt means less quality, more realtime
actually for a long time i never used rt (mode, not kernel)  - jack doesn't work with it
yah so now you are using ubuntu or studio?
studio, but struggling with abovementioned problems :D
